Title: GDPR Checklist - An Overview of the Steps Towards Compliance
Details:
The toughest data privacy law in European business history - the GDPR - comes into effect in May 2018, so you and your company canâ€™t afford to delay your GDPR readiness plans and compliance initiatives. Your organisation needs to be 100% compliant before this looming deadline; with so much to do, and the risks being so high, this might seem like a daunting task.

We have prepared a checklist which will help you and your organisation to identify the steps you need to take towards compliance, whether you are at the beginning of this process or already starting to implement the necessary changes.

Download the GDPR Checklist for CEOs
Author: Mike Morrissey
